SEARCH
Package wtf.file.api.editable.data

Schnittstelle EditablePixel

Alle Superschnittstellen:
Pixel
public interface EditablePixel extends Pixel
An interface extending Pixel to provide editable functionality for individual pixels.

This interface allows modification of pixel values for different color channels and ensures that values set for pixels are within the allowed range.

  • Methodenübersicht

    Modifizierer und Typ
    Methode
    Beschreibung
    void
    setValue(ColorChannel channel, short value)
    Sets the value for a specific color channel in this pixel.
    void
    setValues(Map<ColorChannel,Short> values)
    Sets the values for all color channels in this pixel.

    Von Schnittstelle geerbte Methoden wtf.file.api.data.Pixel

    colorSpace, valueOf, values, withColorSpace, withWidth

  • Methodendetails

    • setValues

      void setValues(Map<ColorChannel,Short> values) throws NumberOutOfBoundsException
      Sets the values for all color channels in this pixel.

      This method allows you to update the pixel with a map of channel values, where the key is the ColorChannel and the value is the corresponding pixel value.

      Parameter:
      values - a map of color channels with their corresponding pixel values.
      Löst aus:
      NumberOutOfBoundsException - if any of the values exceed the allowed range for that channel.
      IllegalArgumentException - if the map does not contain the exact channels required by the color space

    • setValue

      void setValue(ColorChannel channel, short value) throws NumberOutOfBoundsException
      Sets the value for a specific color channel in this pixel.
      Parameter:
      channel - the ColorChannel to update.
      value - the new value to set for the specified channel.
      Löst aus:
      NumberOutOfBoundsException - if the value is out of the allowed range for the specified channel.
      IllegalArgumentException - if the channel is not part of the color space
